item.title: Teleport Command Problem
item.dc:creator: @homerunhitta977 homerunhitta977
item.description:
@homerunhitta977 wrote:

Well I’ve changed the teleport command and their location to what I wanted, but regular players can’t teleport there only I can. I says the the player rights are equivelent to “0” but players can’t teleport there… Here’s the code…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shops") && playerRights > 0) { triggerTele(3281, 2769, 0); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && playerRights > 0) { triggerTele(3081, 3504, 0);

Thanks,

Anthony
